title: Billionaire Drop-Offs: Hundreds Fall Off The 2020 List Amid Pandemic-Induced Market Plunge
description: From WeWork’s Adam Neumann to Canada Goose chief Dani Reiss, 267 people who were billionaires a year ago did not make onto Forbes’ new list of the World’s Billionaires.
content: Forbes estimates former WeWork chief executive Adam Neumann s fortune at million Jamel Toppin The coronavirus crash erased nearly all of the stock market gains enjoyed by billionaires over the past year It also knocked many from the billionaire ranks chars
